title: After  installing the SIM card, the Cordless Phone notices “please insert card” or“invalid card”
answer:
1) Check whether the Cordless Phone has been in the locking terminal & card mode
2) Check whether SIM card has been locked
3) Check whether the PIN code of the SIM card has been opened.
4) Check whether the SIM card has been damaged (use mobile phone to check the SIM card)
5) Check whether the direction of SIM is right.
